# Safeword

AI code quality tool - enforces best practices through hooks, linting, and guided workflows.

## Do Not Edit

**All files in `.safeword/` are auto-generated and will be overwritten on `safeword upgrade`.**

To customize behavior, add overrides to `CLAUDE.md` or `.cursor/rules/` instead.

See [SAFEWORD.md](./SAFEWORD.md) for full agent instructions.
